amendment.description: Amendment provided for notification to an applicant to the SBIR and STTR programs who is not successful in receiving an award, that the applicant can request an explanation of why the applicant did not receive the award.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-603 to notifiy an applicant to the SBIR and STTR programs, who is not successful in receiving an award, that the applicant can request an explanation of why the applicant did not receive the award.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sestak amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Sestak.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sestak amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
